'''14w32c''' is the forty-fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 8, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140815000707/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-snapshot-14w32a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w32d|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes from [[14w32a]] and [[14w32b]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Armor stand]]s'''
* Added <code>NoBasePlate</code> tag - disables the base plate.

'''[[Slime block]]s'''
* Changed placing/breaking sounds.
** Use hurt sounds of [[slime]]s.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w32c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|51461|Items do not go into chest from a hopper while it is receiving items from two directions/inputs.
|;dev
|44859|Breaking / placing a slime block sounds like stone.
|64425|Can't place blocks on TNT.
|64513|Cannot go upstairs if there is a carpet above a step.
|65230|Collision bug when player is moving up a slope adjacent to a 3-high wall.
|;prev
|65872|No book on enchantment table.
|65874|Existing/old chests are invisible.
|65876|Jungle planks craft spruce fences/gates.
|65935|{{cmd|entitydata}} doesn't change the pose tag on armor stands until player relogs.
|65938|End portal blocks are invisible albeit the smoke particles.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w32c was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* It is impossible to join a server if the client is running 14w32c, even if the server is running 14w32c.<ref>{{bug|MC-66143}}</ref>
